thread.title: 4 Cities to Explore with Europe Tour Packages (Pooja Shree)
thread.title_full: 4 Cities to Explore with Europe Tour Packages (Pooja Shree)

title: 4 Cities to Explore with Europe Tour Packages (Pooja Shree)
text: By Pooja Shree Jul 4, 2015 Europe is one of the most popular tourist destinations on the globe. People from all over the world are attracted by its timeless history, picturesque beauty, colossal museums, sophisticated arts, elegant shops, swanky restaurants and energetic nightlife. The continent boasts the world famous Eiffel tower, Acropolis, Tower Bridge, Notre Dame Cathedral, Colosseum and Louvre. There are other notable sites like Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Edinburgh and Vatican City, which are delightful to see. With Europe tour packages, globetrotters can witness the culture of London, styles of Paris, ages-old churches of Rome and towering castles of Prague. Visitors can also indulge in numerous sporting activities like hiking, skiing, bungee jumping, swimming and go-karting. Here is a list of four cities that should not be missed by tourists during Europe Holidays. London With so many attractions and things to do, London - the capital city of England, has something to offer for every type of tourist. From popular British Museum, National Gallery, Natural History Museum, London Eye to Tate Modern, this historical place abounds in countless architectural and artistic wonders. This land of history and glory is more than just palaces and museums, and is equally known for its art, culture, cuisines and fashion. Paris With Europe tour packages, globetrotters can visit Paris, which is known worldwide for its architectural marvels, exquisite cuisines, sophisticated boutiques and artistic trove. It houses top attractions like Arc de Triomphe, Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame Cathedral. No city can be as fashionable and stylish as Paris. Apart from many vintage shops and flea markets, a slew of elegant boutiques, haute couture houses, customised departmental stores and quirky shops can be found at this place. With hundreds of swanky restaurants, caf√©s and canteens along with famous bistros and brasseries, Paris is reputed for its food. Rome Rome, capital city of Italy, is the land of mystery and magic that basks in the glory of its colossal monuments, churches and preserved ruins. Europe tour packages gives visitors a chance to get an insight of its history, food, art and nightlife. They can experience one of the best sightseeing tours in Rome by exploring its prominent locations like Colosseum, Roman Forum, Pantheon, Vatican City and Piazza Navona. These historical marvels are fine example of ancient engineering and showcase the past glory of the Roman Empire. This historical city is more than its towering and majestic churches. It also features a number of exciting venues for adventurous activities. From tandem paragliding, horse riding on a beach, parachute jump, soft rafting, go-karting to paint ball, the city offers a lot of things to do for visitors. Prague The capital city of Czech Republic with a number of golden spires, UNESCO recognized sites and splendid castles, Prague is one of the favourite tourist destinations in the world. Availing Europe tour packages is the best way to see top locations like Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, Jewish Museum, Loreto and towers of Prague. It is known for its beer consumption and a beer shop can be found at every corner of the city. From big shopping malls, groceries to boutiques, this city features a horde of shopping outlets. About the Author With a number of amazing attractions and a horde of things to do, Europe holidays can be a memorable experience for the lifetime. Rating:
